title: The President of the Republic reiterates Algeria's willingness to help Mali restore stability
text: The President of the Republic Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune on Sunday reiterated Algeria’s willingness to help Mali in the restoration of its stability and the preparation of elections awaited by the Malian people.

In a statement to the press after the meeting he had with his Malian counterpart Mr. Bah N'Daw, The President said that “the meeting with the Malian head of state, who is on a working and friendship visit to Algeria, was an opportunity to express our congratulations on the return of serenity in his country and for the meeting held recently in Kidal (northern Mali).”

"As we have already stated in previous meetings, we remain at the disposal of our Malian brothers for anything they deem necessary in the current stage to ease the situation and prepare for elections they have decided”.
The President of the Republic also seized this opportunity to "warmly welcome" Mr. Bah N'Daw and the delegation accompanying him.
